ApptBundleAggrPolicy.name: ApptBundleAggrPolicy
ApptBundleAggrPolicy.description: Policy that defines how the property values of the bundle members are aggregated and assigned to the bundle.

AggregationAction.description: The aggregation action to be performed.

AggregationFieldType.description: The target field type in the bundle to which the aggregation is directed.

AggregationOrder.description: The order the aggregation is triggered.

BundleFieldName.description: Name of the target field in the bundle where the value is taken from the bundle member.

BundleMemberAddiFieldName.description: Name of an additional source field that is connected to the initial source field in the bundle member from which the value is taken.

BundleMemberFieldName.description: Name of the source field in the bundle member from which the value is taken.

BundlePolicyId.description: ID of the parent bundle policy.

ConstantValue.description: The constant value that is used in the aggregation.

DateValue.description: Represents how the date value will be determined.

DoesAllowDuplicateStrings.description: Indicates if you want to allow the same string to appear more than once when using the 'Sum based on Bundle Members' action type.

DownscaleSortDirection.description: Applies only if the Set Downscaled Duration action is set. The downscaling sorting direction of the bundle member service appointments, according to their duration.

FilterCriteriaId.description: The active recordset filter criteria used for aggregating the bundle members.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MaxBundleDuration.description: The maximum bundle duration that can be accumulated from the bundle members (after downscaling).

Name.description: The name of the appointment bundle aggregation policy.

ShouldUpdateOnCreationOnly.description: Indicates if you want to update the field in the bundle only when it is created.

ApptBundleAggrPolicy.accessRules: Field Service must be enabled. Bundling must be enabled in the Field Service Settings. The Field Service Admin, Field Service Bundle for Dispatcher, and Field Service Integration permission sets must be enabled.
